RelatedSentence: Josiah Williams , both of the 372nd Engineer Brigade of Minnesota , joined a rotation of soldiers from all over the world during Beyond the Horizon 2014 - Guatemala .
Meyer held services for the soldiers who were interested , as well as hosted bible study groups throughout the rotation .
Meyer and Williams both joined the troops at each site to provide a helping hand with the construction of the buildings and get to know the soldiers .
